entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is introduced as arriving in the kitchen where his relatives are already seated.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is Harry's uncle and one of the Dursleys. He is described as having a large red face and hiding behind the Daily Mail.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is Harry's aunt and one of the Dursleys. She is described as cutting a grapefruit into quarters with her lips pursed over her horselike teeth.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Harry's cousin and one of the Dursleys. He is described as looking furious and sulky, taking up a lot of space at the table.

relationships.description: Harry is related to Uncle Vernon.
Harry is related to Aunt Petunia.
Harry is a cousin of Dudley.
